tutoring

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • tutoring.Section
      • tutoring.Session

  • public class Session
extends Section
    This class represents a particular session of a tutoring section, which is just the date of the session.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class tutoring.Section

        con, course_num, day, s, semester, students, subj, time, year

      • markSkipped

        public void markSkipped(Student student,
                        java.lang.String reason)
        Allows the tutor to mark someone as absent Updates the skip count for that student if the reason is NA
        Parameters:
        student - refers to the student we are marking as absent
        reason - refers to the reason the student provides for being absent. By default, reason = "NA"

        Parameters:
